sentence.Network_en: He has never exhibited the self-confidence, bordering on arrogance, of his predecessor.
sentence.Network_cn: 他从未表现出他前任的那种近乎傲慢的自信。

sentence.Network_en: I felt so self-conscious under Luke's mother's intense gaze.
sentence.Network_cn: 在卢克母亲审视的目光下，我感到极不自在。

sentence.Network_en: She has now changed into a happy, self-confident woman.
sentence.Network_cn: 如今她已经变成一个快乐、自信的女人。

auth_sentence.content: But now he's returned to his former self.
auth_sentence.res_content: But now he's returned to his former self.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But now he's returned to his former self.

auth_sentence.content: It ruins people's sense of self-worth, dignity.
auth_sentence.res_content: It ruins people's sense of self-worth, dignity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It ruins people's sense of self-worth, dignity.

auth_sentence.content: To believe otherwise is to delude one's self.
auth_sentence.res_content: To believe otherwise is to delude one's self.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To believe otherwise is to delude one's self.

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自百度翻译。
